verses.name: Joshua 12:1
verses.text: Hi sunt reges, quos percusserunt filii Israël, et possederunt terram eorum trans Jordanem ad solis ortum, a torrente Arnon usque ad montem Hermon, et omnem orientalem plagam, quæ respicit solitudinem.

verses.name: Joshua 12:2
verses.text: Sehon rex Amorrhæorum, qui habitavit in Hesebon, dominatus est ab Aroër, quæ sita est super ripam torrentis Arnon, et mediæ partis in valle, dimidiæque Galaad, usque ad torrentem Jaboc, qui est terminus filiorum Ammon.

verses.name: Joshua 12:3
verses.text: Et a solitudine usque ad mare Ceneroth contra orientem, et usque ad mare deserti, quod est mare salsissimum, ad orientalem plagam per viam quæ ducit Bethsimoth : et ab australi parte, quæ subjacet Asedoth, Phasga.

verses.name: Joshua 12:4
verses.text: Terminus Og regis Basan, de reliquiis Raphaim, qui habitavit in Astaroth, et in Edrai, et dominatus est in monte Hermon, et in Salecha, atque in universa Basan, usque ad terminos

verses.name: Joshua 12:5
verses.text: Gessuri, et Machati, et dimidiæ partis Galaad : terminos Sehon regis Hesebon.

verses.name: Joshua 12:6
verses.text: Moyses famulus Domini et filii Israël percusserunt eos, tradiditque terram eorum Moyses in possessionem Rubenitis, et Gaditis, et dimidiæ tribui Manasse.

verses.name: Joshua 12:7
verses.text: Hi sunt reges terræ, quos percussit Josue et filii Israël trans Jordanem ad occidentalem plagam, a Baalgad in campo Libani, usque ad montem cujus pars ascendit in Seir : tradiditque eam Josue in possessionem tribubus Israël, singulis partes suas,

verses.name: Joshua 12:8
verses.text: tam in montanis quam in planis atque campestribus. In Asedoth, et in solitudine, ac in meridie, Hethæus fuit et Amorrhæus, Chananæus, et Pherezæus, Hevæus et Jebusæus.

verses.name: Joshua 12:9
verses.text: Rex Jericho unus : rex Hai, quæ est ex latere Bethel, unus :

verses.name: Joshua 12:10
verses.text: rex Jerusalem unus, rex Hebron unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:11
verses.text: rex Jerimoth unus, rex Lachis unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:12
verses.text: rex Eglon unus, rex Gazer unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:13
verses.text: rex Dabir unus, rex Gader unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:14
verses.text: rex Herma unus, rex Hered unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:15
verses.text: rex Lebna unus, rex Odullam unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:16
verses.text: rex Maceda unus, rex Bethel unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:17
verses.text: rex Taphua unus, rex Opher unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:18
verses.text: rex Aphec unus, rex Saron unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:19
verses.text: rex Madon unus, rex Asor unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:20
verses.text: rex Semeron unus, rex Achsaph unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:21
verses.text: rex Thenac unus, rex Mageddo unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:22
verses.text: rex Cades unus, rex Jachanan Carmeli unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:23
verses.text: rex Dor et provinciæ Dor unus, rex gentium Galgal unus,

verses.name: Joshua 12:24
verses.text: rex Thersa unus : omnes reges triginta unus.
